content:
You assure Bo that you're on the lookout for his letter, and you'll recover it should you spot it.

"I wish I knew for sure where the courier dropped it, but I have no clue. All I know is that he lost more letters than just mine. He said the velox attack happened at about the halfway point of his route. Not sure if that helps, but that's all I know."

Discard Bo. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
